title: Loss and Renewal
description: Maya Shankar was well on her way to an extraordinary career as a violinist when an injury closed that door. She eventually found a new path forward in a very different field.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: Maya Shankar was well on her way to an extraordinary career as a violinist when an injury closed that door. She eventually found a new path forward in a very different field.
